name: MTLTextureDescriptor
desc: An object that you use to configure new Metal texture objects.

items.name: texture2DDescriptor
items.desc: Creates a texture descriptor object for a 2D texture.

items.name: textureCubeDescriptor
items.desc: Creates a texture descriptor object for a cube texture.

items.name: textureBufferDescriptor
items.desc: Creates a texture descriptor object for a texture buffer.

items.name: textureType
items.desc: The dimension and arrangement of texture image data.

items.name: pixelFormat
items.desc: The size and bit layout of all pixels in the texture.

items.name: width
items.desc: The width of the texture image for the base level mipmap, in pixels.

items.name: height
items.desc: The height of the texture image for the base level mipmap, in pixels.

items.name: depth
items.desc: The depth of the texture image for the base level mipmap, in pixels.

items.name: mipmapLevelCount
items.desc: The number of mipmap levels for this texture.

items.name: sampleCount
items.desc: The number of samples in each fragment.

items.name: arrayLength
items.desc: The number of array elements for this texture.

items.name: resourceOptions
items.desc: The behavior of a new memory allocation.

items.name: cpuCacheMode
items.desc: The CPU cache mode used for the CPU mapping of the texture.

items.name: storageMode
items.desc: The location and access permissions of the texture.

items.name: hazardTrackingMode
items.desc: The texture's hazard tracking mode.

items.name: allowGPUOptimizedContents
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the GPU is allowed to adjust the texture's contents to improve GPU performance.

items.name: usage
items.desc: Options that determine how you can use the texture.

items.name: swizzle
items.desc: The pattern you want the GPU to apply to pixels when you read or sample pixels from the texture.

items.name: MTLTextureSwizzle
items.desc: A set of options to choose from when creating a texture swizzle pattern.

items.name: MTLTextureType
items.desc: The dimension of each image, including whether multiple images are arranged into an array or a cube.

items.name: ct MTLTextureUsage
items.desc: An enumeration for the various options that determine how you can use a texture.

items.name: ocol MTLTexture
items.desc: A resource that holds formatted image data.

items.name: s MTKTextureLoader
items.desc: An object that decodes common image formats into Metal textures for use in your app.

items.name: s MTLSharedTextureHandle
items.desc: A texture handle that can be shared across process address space boundaries.

items.name: MTLPixelFormat
items.desc: The data formats that describe the organization and characteristics of individual pixels in a texture.
